fields.text: Thank you for calling Lyte in San Francisco, your trusted source for genuine fan-returned event tickets.
For new ticket purchases or to browse available events, press [INDEX].
To search and buy tickets for concerts, sports, and theater, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we connect you to our ticket sales team.
For bulk orders, corporate sales, or special packages, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we connect you to our group sales specialists.
For assistance with existing orders or ticket support, press [INDEX].
To review or modify an existing order, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we transfer you to our customer care team.
To request a refund or report an issue with your tickets, press [INDEX].
